attributes.action: Reduction of the televison license if recent sexual abuse claims against The BBC are proven.
attributes.additional_details: Relating to the recent allegations of sexual abuse against various individuals of The BBC over recent decades I would like to raise the issue of a reduction in the television license. Although we have to wait for the outcome of full reports and investigations in to these allegations, I would like to raise the issue of a reduction in the license fee if these allegations are found to be true.
